page.title: 19Transport
page.content: {Transport. Buses.}Weekly buses from Lyndhurst: 7 to Bournemouth, 1 to Ringwood, 1 to New Milton, 107 to Lymington, 1 to Romsey, 24 to Fritham, 104 to Southampton. There are no buses to Emery Down or Bank.{There {are a lot of cars going past the {school. In 1 hour 11- 12 noon, 600 {cars, 142 lorries, 8 bikes, 8 buses, 8 {motor bikes,and 6 caravans.}Vehicles counted at the Fire Station on June 17th. 7.05 to 7.20- 105 1985 7.20 to 7.35 - 218, 7.35 to 7.50 - 295, 7.50 to 8.05 - 330, 8.05 to 8.20 - 375. Total 1323 vehicles in 1 hour 15 minutes, only 2 buses. {The village needs a by pass for {lorries, coaches and through traffic. {Karen Morris, U.S.A. 8.
